Published in January 2023: "Trends in racial and ethnic discrimination in #hiring in six #Western countries": https://www.pnas.org/doi/full/10.1073/pnas.2212875120‚∏∫#reputation #race #racism #whiteSupremacy #whiteness #exploitation#history #learning #learn #sociologyHere below are graphs of discrimination ratios over time by racialized group. The shaded area is 95% confidence region. You may notice that #discrimination has been stable since the #1970s except for a rise against MENA-passing persons since 1990.Speeches matter: Colin Powell‚Äôs presentation at the UN Security Council didn‚Äôt directly lead to the #Iraq invasion but feeded #islamophobia: https://www.npr.org/2023/02/03/1151160567/colin-powell-iraq-un-weapons-mass-destruction #USHistory
